title: geth import: fatal error: runtime: out of memory
body:
Running `geth import` on my Raspberry Pi2 (1GB ram, 2GB swap) after #1080 has been fixed:

develop f5ce848cfe8cc1912714b8185f8dd3358a16687a

```

```
Poor RPi :-( Best to just update using the net. Upgrade uses a lot of memory

We've just figured out an issue why this might happen. Hopefully it'll be sorted out in a few hours. Until then it's probably simpler to just pull from the net (unless bandwidth is a concern, it'll take roughly the same amount of time).
with 27e0d2a97325edc9a870a747412d0b9a2abd1ed1 the import is now successfully getting past the block where it previously crashed (still importing though).
